articles.title: Why are more Americans declining COVID-19 vaccine boosters? - FOX 26 Houston
articles.description: More Americans are declining COVID-19 boosters. Right now, the CDC says only 20 percent of adults in the nation are getting boosted leaving them with little protection against being hospitalized for symptoms of COVID-19. Dr. Peter Hotez with Baylor College of…
